Welcome to Beer411
Your place to find that special Beer or Bar

Item input fields

  • Add a Beer
  • Add a Bar

    • Here users can input their favorite beer or bar to our lists.

    Beer name is required for beers but the rest of the field is optional.

    Bar namd and address are required

    Please note you have to follow the instructions on what to input as its language specific in some cases

Search our lists of Beers and Bars

  • Search our Beer List
  • Search our Bar List

    • Hit the search buttons to view our list of Beers and Bars

    Within each overall list you can use the single view button to see detailed information on each beer and bar.

    Use the Filter to search for a particular beer or bar.
